title: Software Engineer
description: Develop and maintain scalable web applications. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in full-stack development

title: Frontend Developer
description: Build responsive user interfaces and improve user experience across web platforms.
qualifications: Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript

title: Backend Developer
description: Design and implement server-side logic and maintain databases.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Create user-centered designs and improve usability across applications.
qualifications: Proficiency in Figma or Adobe XD

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze large datasets to extract meaningful insights for business decisions.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Maintain CI/CD pipelines and manage cloud infrastructure.

title: Content Writer
description: Create engaging blog posts, articles, and marketing content.

title: Customer Support Representative
description: Assist customers with inquiries and provide technical support.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android.
qualifications: Experience with React Native or Flutter

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Monitor and protect company systems from cybersecurity threats.
